author: Rob Lowe

text:
@*****
Why wouldn't I like my comment?¬† I don't write something I say and go "Man, this sucks.¬† Who wrote this."¬† Also anyone with half a brain can see the fucking copyright dates and platform don't jibe with this being a spin-off.¬† Use your brain.
author: Rob Lowe

text: The goddamn cover of the game says the date of release on the video.¬† This isn't that hard jackass.
author: Rob Lowe

text: I did.¬† Are you fucking kidding me with this nonsense?¬† You are perhaps the most clueless fool to ever post a comment on Youtube.¬† The cover pic makes it highly obvious.¬† The joke was to play off of the sort of young gamer that WOULDN'T understand this game was many years old.¬† And you took the bait perfectly.
author: Rob Lowe

text: My comment was a joke.¬† You took it seriously.¬† That makes you an idiot.¬† Case closed.¬† How low of an intellectual capacity must you have to not understand the simplicity of this?¬† Everything about this video made it obvious this game predates Uncharted by years, yet you remain adamantly opposed to the fact that I was not being serious.¬† Couple thousand views on this video... seems like you're the only one who didn't get my comment was a joke.¬† You just can't admit you're wrong can you?¬† Is your personal life in such a sad place that this is the only stance where you feel like you can stand your ground?¬† Do you need emotional support to help you get out of the hole your life is in?¬† I can provide you the names of some qualified counselors if you wish.
author: Rob Lowe

text: Wow, you have a sad existence.
author: Rob Lowe

author: Lance Steward

text: Hey! I played UW on the sega genesis. This was one of the first games I played when I was 6 or 7. Spend my days playing and listening to the awesome soundtrack. I just wish you will be able to upload more UW into here as I already have the UW 2 soundtrack which I love. But UW ost make me look back at my life when I was a small kid. The days I spend the afternoon playing the game after school. Dreaming to be an explorer one day. Lol. Thanks for the upload!
